channel.title: (pi) how to: change a weapons examine description plz click! comment
channel.description:
click the url beklow to see pic [url=http://oi49.tinypic.com/qn0hw0.jpg]http://oi49.tinypic.com/qn0hw0.jpg[/url]
i loveing! changed it everywhere !! how to change the description and name when ur mouse hovers over the whip!!? it only chnages the name in the shops i don't know why when i changed the freaking name of it in 3 files 2 client sided and 1 sserver sided
plz help

item.title: (pi) how to: change a weapons examine description plz click! comment
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

You guys are hilarious.

Host Gushers:

did u complie it and then run it? :l

You can’t compile configuration files…

[quote=“pkk1n6b0ss, post:2, topic:469094”]ffs
someone help this kid out? i don’t know much about coding soz[/quote]
Then don’t post.

[quote=“scared kid, post:4, topic:469094”]l0l0l0l —^
ofc i did i compiled it 3 times
no errors on neither compiler or run
can u teamviewer me? if u know what to do[/quote]
Be mature and speak proper English, please.

@The OP’s Issue: You have to find where it is loading the item definitions, and then find wherever it assigns the description String. Like for my Hyperion,

String examine = Buffers.readString(buffer);

Loads the examine string from the binary file, you would have to do something like this.

Buffers.readString(buffer);//To keep it reading in the proper order
String examine = "I'm the description!";

Some previous user obviously isn’t loading it from that file any longer, so you have to find where he or she edited it, so you can make it what you want.

Read full topic
